name: VI Rooms
description:
VI rooms is a time trial endless game where you need to catch and leave ghosts to the required room before the time ends. Don't forget to go to your pantheon too!

Controls:

Use W/A/S/D to move around the rooms.

Use 'Left Shift' to go faster.

Credits and metions:
  • Music & Sounds:
    • "Halloween Ghost Party" by Loyalty Freak Music.
    • "The Hampster Dance Song" by Hampton and the Hampster. (Modified)
    • "DR SFX DEATH GOREnew2" by DiscRoom Team. (Modified)
  • Unity Assets:
    • DOTween (HOTween v2).
